com.hdcookbook.grin.io.binary
Class GrinBinaryReader

java.lang.Object
  com.hdcookbook.grin.io.binary.GrinBinaryReader

public class GrinBinaryReader
extends java.lang.Object

The main class to read in a Show object from a binary file format.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a GrinBinaryReader instance.
 
Method Summary
 Show readShow()
          Reconstructes the Show object that this GrinBinaryReader is associated with.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

Constructor Detail

GrinBinaryReader

public GrinBinaryReader(Director director,
                        java.io.InputStream stream)
Constructs a GrinBinaryReader instance.

Parameters:
director - A Director for the show instance this Reader will create.
stream - An InputStream to the grin binary format data. It is recommended to be an instance of BufferedInputStream for a performance improvement.
Method Detail

readShow

public Show readShow()
              throws java.io.IOException
Reconstructes the Show object that this GrinBinaryReader is associated with.

Returns:
Show a show object that has been reconstructed.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if binary data parsing fails.
